long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension helps you manage links and set reminder for you to use the link. 

The idea is to save a link, set an expiry date and when the date elapse, you will receive a notification that your link has expired. 

This is to improve on bookmarks where you just save a link and forget about it. 

The extension offers a feature that reminds you daily you have expired links if any of your links has expired. 

You can edit or delete saved links.
You can also save your links to an external storage system, so you can get access to your links after a system crash or when you change device
